did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers Collection, 1930, 1936, n.d.
did.abstract: The collection includes two pieces of correspondence by Caroline T. Burkham (President) and two pamphlets produced by the Industrial Education Association of Southern Mountaineers.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers Collection, Ms2011-059, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers Collection was purchased by Special Collections in May 2011.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers Collection was completed in June 2011.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers was a charitable organization devoted to improving conditions for families and individuals. Materials in the collection do not clearly indicate the geographic locations covered by the "southern mountains." In addition to collecting money for scholarships, the organization also solicited donations of supplies for mountain people.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes two pieces of correspondence by Caroline T. Burkham (President) and two pamphlets produced by the Industrial Education Association of Southern Mountaineers. The pamphlets describe conditions in which mountain people were living, as well as the activities of the group on behalf of the mountaineers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials in this collection are in chronological order. Undated items are at the end.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Industrial Education Association for Southern Mountaineers.
